channel.title: Tor has no connection when using VPN on host ubuntu 16.04. works without VPN
channel.description:
I'm running whonix in virtualbox on ubuntu 16.04. Using VPN from IPvanish.
My problem is that tor will load everything fine when not using the VPN on my host but when I do connect to the VPN on the host tor will not load anything but firefox on the host will.
Your help will be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Tor has no connection when using VPN on host ubuntu 16.04. works without VPN
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

It means Tor Browser Bundle.

Have a nice day,

Ego
